title: Meta is working on making its offices a little more peaceful
description: The hybrid workplace is a noisier workplace, at least for Meta. In a bid to make its offices a little more peaceful, the firm has called in the experts.

title: AMD wants to build on AI with its next generation of graphics cards
description: AMD executives just teased RDNA 4 graphics cards, even though RDNA 3 is still very fresh. It seems AI in GPUs is definitely on AMD's radar.
